name: TheFail_ConceptDemo
description:
If someone finds a bug or have an idea to improve the game please report it UPDATE.0.2

In this uptade I solved a Bug in the XploitMaker part.

Ty so much to JustGameplay to find the bug and report it.

UPDATE.0.1

The game tell the history of a boy who wants delete a photo on internet but he had problems end he try to solve it.

The game is in Development and I will try to update the game whenever I can.

The ConceptDemo take 5 min aprox. to finish it. And it show the concept of the future demo of the game.
